Articles.Content:
I use a beefy rig to play KSP, with a large 1080p monitor, so i wanted to take advantage of this by making the nav ball larger, so i can read it more clearly and make my burns more accurate, however, a side effect was that now the other UI elements are scaled up as well, so long staging lists no longer fit on my screen amongst other niggles i have. Its certainly nothing game-breaking, but it does bother me after a while.

Would it be possible (if it isnt already) to allow the nav ball UI element to be scaled individually from the other elements (such as staging lists and the altimeter). Or even if each could be exclusivley scaled.

I thought it would be a nice change to make a non-gameplay suggestion for a change, mix things up

Thanks guys
